sql.att: WITH AURS AS (SELECT AU.PID, AUF.FLAG_CODE FROM AU_IX_POI AU, AU_IX_POI_FLAG AUF WHERE AU.STATE = ${STATE} AND AU.ATT_OPRSTATUS = 0 AND AU.AUDATA_ID = AUF.AUDATA_ID AND ${NOT} EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_HIS_IX_POI_EXT EXT WHERE EXT.PID = AU.PID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_AU_IX_POI_MUL_TASK TMP WHERE TMP.PID = AU.PID)) SELECT AURS.PID as POI_PID, '110000200000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000200000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000200000') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID as POI_PID, '110000210000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000210000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000210000') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID as POI_PID, '110000220000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000220000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000220000') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID as POI_PID, '110000110002' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000110002' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000110002') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID as POI_PID, '110000030000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000030000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000030000')

sql.att: WITH AURS AS (SELECT PID, FLAG_CODE FROM AU_IX_POI AU, AU_IX_POI_FLAG AUF WHERE AU.AUDATA_ID = ${AUDATA_ID} AND AU.AUDATA_ID = AUF.AUDATA_ID) SELECT AURS.PID, '110000200000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000200000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000200000') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID, '110000210000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000210000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000210000') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID, '110000220000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000220000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000220000') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID, '110000110002' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000110002' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000110002') UNION ALL SELECT AURS.PID, '110000030000' AS FLAG_CODE, 0 AS U_RECORD, NULL AS U_FIELDS FROM AURS WHERE FLAG_CODE = '110000030000' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_FLAG RS WHERE RS.POI_PID = AURS.PID AND RS.FLAG_CODE = '110000030000')
